wikipedia_page.main: Peter Griffiths (born 13 March 1980) is an English former professional footballer who played on the wing in the Football League for Macclesfield Town. He also played non-league football for clubs including Ashton United and Winsford United.

response: Peter Griffiths (1928–2013) was a British politician.
Peter Griffiths may also refer to:
*Peter Griffiths, murderer of June Anne Devaney
